name: Chess Mix
description:
Chess Mix is in early development. More info coming soon.

Version 007 - hot fix, made the game window smaller for now

Version 005-006 notes:

- The overmap now FUNCTIONS!!!!! It records your scores and stuff!

- There are now FIVE MISSIONS!

- When you step on an item and you already have an item, you now SWAP items.
- DANCE WITH SOMEBODY ability now gives a HUNGRY buff which halts cooldowns until you eat something.
- Pizza slices no longer spawn under units and other resources
- No longer plays unit information if you already selected that unit last
- Debug buttons should be usable again
- New Karaoke graphic
- Fixed match-end screen
- Reversed the % for sodas and chips, it used to be 60/40 chips/soda, now it's 40/60
- Fixed the resizing issue of the app sorta
